Name: Agent Stilus
About the game: Agent Stilus is a 2D side-scrolling platformer shooter. Omega Corp creates implants and chips for implantation into people. The bandits have stolen a batch of chips and are going to change the encoding and implant these chips in everyone in order to enslave free people and make them their puppets. You are a special agent who was sent to take the prototype chips back before the villains put production on stream. Cyberpunk setting. Several types of weapons. Enemies are armed with different weapons.
